QuestData.Title: A Surly Dwarf
QuestData.Description: Before you go there is someone you might want to talk with.$b$bHe's opinionated, a bit gruff, and very overbearing, but he's the best damn warrior I've met in ages.$b$bHe belongs on the front lines with you, commander. And trust me, he knows it.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Speak with Delvar Ironfist at Stormshield in Ashran.
QuestData.RewardText: Look, I don't have time for any... Oh, it's you!
